result.arabic_text: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحۡشُرَنَّهُمۡ وَٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحۡضِرَنَّهُمۡ حَوۡلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيّٗا
result.translation: 68. Tokkel Nabiyow ku-Rabbil xiibita immay diggah ken kee sheytoona gaaboysenno Qhiyaamah ayro, tohuk lakal diggah Jahannam deraafel inkih guluubah anuk ken xayyoysenno.
